location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter concerns samples of sulphur sent from Bushire to Bombay. Farish requests that further samples of sulphur be sent for the Presidencies of Bengal and Madras. Includes a copy of a report, dated 31 March 1813, from James Inverarity, Agent for Gunpowder, Bombay, to William Newnham, Secretary to the Military Board, Bombay, regarding the quality of the sulphur sent from Bushire.
